attributes.action: reduce the maximum time a person maybe held under anti-terrorism laws to 1 day as in the United States
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government of the day is attempting to force through a detention period of 42 days for terrorism suspects
Not only is the term terrorist losely defined, but 42 days is unbelievably high compared to other nations

United States is 1 day
Canada is 2 days
France is 4 days
Turkey is 7 1/2 days
Russia is 7 days

The terrorist threat facing the United Kingdom is far below the threat faced by those above.
How can the government justify 42 days, when America which suffered the terrible attacks of 9/11 only endures 1 day of stealing someone's freedom
